properties.name: Al Diwan - 30, Avenue George V
properties.description: Posted by Incognito Get a rapid Lebanese sandwich or eat in. Good Lebanese anyway.

properties.name: BC Black Calvados - 40, Avenue Pierre 1er de Serbie
properties.description: Posted by Incognito Very small and very black club :) You need to be cool or know people to get in.

properties.name: Café Chic - 126, rue du faubourg Saint - Honore
properties.description: Posted by Incognito I like this one. Fashionable but cosy. Good for drinks, open till 5 am. Never tried the food though.

properties.name: Colette - 213, rue Saint-Honoré
properties.description: Posted by Incognito  213, Rue st honore, parisGo here if you want to know what\'s trendy arounf the world. You can have a light lunch here too and can find the largest water collection :)

properties.name: Doobie's - 2 rue Robert Estienne, 75008 Paris
properties.description: Posted by Incognito Good fun bar. Good music to get you in the spirit for a club so "a before". Girls get free champagne nearly always :)

properties.name: Footsie - 10, Rue Daunou, 75002 Paris
properties.description: Posted by Incognito Drinks after work.

properties.name: Harry's Bar - 5, Rue Daunou, 75002 Paris
properties.description: Posted by Incognito American Cocktail Bar..invented the Bloody Mary, good place for drinks after work or after a dinner for a chat.

properties.name: Hôtel Costes - 239, Rue St Honoré
properties.description: Posted by Incognito A very pretty place with good food. If you want to see celebrities and to be seen this is where u should go. The bar is intimate but with good lounge music of course.

properties.name: Koba - 7, Rue La Michodière
properties.description: Posted by Incognito Craziest Japanese in Paris. Actors from the theater nearby usually drop in. Not always very clean but still very popular and delicious. Mr. Koba is a legend.

properties.name: La Cantine du Faubourg - 105, Rue du Faubourg Saint-Honoré, 75008 Paris
properties.description: Posted by Incognito Nice place for dinner if you are looking for fashionable place.

properties.name: La Durée -  75, Avenue Champs Elysées, 75008 Paris
properties.description: Posted by Incognito Enjoy the best Macarons ever with your coffee

properties.name: Le Baron - 6, Avenue Marceau
properties.description: Posted by Incognito Used to be the most hip place in Paris for a while but things are cooling down. A very small club full of stars so they don\'t let anyone in :)

properties.name: Le Cou de la Girafe - 7, Rue Paul Baudry
properties.description: Posted by Incognito Very good for lunch and mybe even for dinner but I never did dinner there. French but not too traditional. Good food in any case.

properties.name: Le Spoon - 12, Rue Marignan
properties.description: Posted by Incognito World food prepared by all these little master soldiers of Alain Ducasse. Go for it if you want fancy and tasty!

properties.name: Les Saveurs de Flora - 36, Avenue George V
properties.description: Posted by Incognito Very good inventive french food. Intimate pretty place.

properties.name: Lo Sushi - 8, Rue Berri, 75008 Paris
properties.description: Posted by Incognito A place that made me love Sushi. It\'s the "sushi go around the central table" concept ;) It\'s my lunch place but ok for a quick dinner too.

properties.name: Milliardaire - 68 Rue Pierre Charron, 75008 Paris
properties.description: Posted by Incognito This is a historical place for me. I used to love it when it was "Cabaret" so still don\'t mind going there from time to time for the sake of old times. It\'s an ok alternative when nothing else more fun is happening and when you just want to dance and don\'t care. Cosy atmosphere but sometimes weird people.

properties.name: Nice Terrasse for Lunch
properties.description: Posted by Incognito No clue what this place is called but it\'s perfect for lunch outside, nice people and close to all the shopping places.

properties.name: Néo Club - 23, Rue Ponthieu, 75008 Paris
properties.description: Posted by Incognito Ok I\'m putting this one on my map cause it\'s fashionable but I didn\'t really like it as I missed the cosiness but I suppose it can be fun. It\'s difficult to enter but if you put a serious face on you\'ll make it.

properties.name: Pershing Hall - 49, Rue Pierre Charron, 75008 Paris
properties.description: Posted by Incognito A "Before" for cocktails, beautiful place. Food also very good. I definitely recommend.

properties.name: Pink Paradise - 49, Rue de Ponthieu
properties.description: Posted by Incognito Yeah well, this is for the boys..a popular strip joint :) and club.

properties.name: Relais de l'Entrecote - 15 rue Marbeuf, 75008 Paris
properties.description: Posted by Incognito If you want meat and fries this is the place. They only have this on the menu but it\'s good. They have their special sauce to go with it. No reservations possible. You usually wait a bit but I still like it.

properties.name: Restaurant Pierre Gagnaire‎ - 6, Rue Balzac
properties.description: Posted by Incognito I am recommending although I\'ve never been there. :) If you want one of the best restaurants in Paris go for it eyes closed. I am still deciding on the person I\'d like to share the experience with..

properties.name: Sens - 23 Rue de Ponthieu, 75008
properties.description: Posted by Incognito Paris has poor choices for party but this one can be fun..I had fun anyway but then again I am not a complicated person. It\'s a restaurant that turns into club after midnight. Nice design, mostly good looking people and good club music.

properties.name: Sir Winston - 5, Rue Presbourg, 75016 Paris
properties.description: Posted by IncognitoCool for brunch, lunch or drinks after work

properties.name: Tania Club - 43, Rue Ponthieu
properties.description: Posted by Incognito I like this one even though small and full of fashionable 22 - 25 year olds. The music and the atmosphere are always very good..relaxing & parisian
